metadata.title: AeraVida Christian Cross Simulated Blue Turquoise Inlay .925 Sterling Silver Pendant
features: Stone: Simulated Turquoise | Color: Cyan Blue-Green | Weight: 3.9 grams
Design Measurements: 22 mm (0.87 in) wide x 43 mm (1.69 in) long (including bail) | Bail Opening Measurement: 2 mm
Finish: Shiny, Polished | Style: Trendy, Symbol, Religious, Christian Cross
Item comes with original AERAVIDA jewelry packaging card. Perfect for gift giving to someone special or keep for yourself!
description: This Christian cross .925 sterling silver pendant was handcrafted by artisan Kai from Thailand. The expertly designed piece features inlaid simulated turquoise in the shape of a cross, which adds uniqueness and beauty. PLEASE NOTE: The handcrafted nature of this product will produce minor differences in design, sizing and weight. Variations will occur from piece to piece, measurements may vary slightly.
works directly with gifted and talented Artisans from all over the world. At the core of our philosophy is fair trade and fostering a sustainable future for our Artisans.

Goong worked very hard learning traditional embroidery, weaving and jewelry design. Her favorite was jewelry design because she loved how she could use native materials such as semi-precious stones and silver to create beautiful pieces. Goong worked hard honing this craft and she opened a small workshop where she could design and create silver jewelry. Goongâ€™s dream of owning her own business so she could provide for her family was finally coming true.
